alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 3:04PM MST until September 12 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 304 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Parker, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Parker and Buckskin Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 15. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 131 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
